prompts: Create a team of six Pokemon that work together in perfect harmony during battle.
Show me a unique Bug-type Pokemon with bright yellow and red features.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies teamwork, with multiple members forming one cohesive unit.
Generate a description for a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and forests.
Make a visual concept of a Pokemon with a playful and energetic personality.
Design a Pokemon that has a strong connection to its environment and its companions.
Give me an idea of a Pokemon that is small in size but has a big heart.
